input.sentences: the road to the hiking trail was poorly marked . we almost missed it .
we were really glad there was n't any through traffic . there was no where to go but back .
there was a great view of the valley from the modest parking area .
in the afternoon we found a spot on the hill to picnic .
we stayed until twilight to catch a shot of the setting sun . it was perfect .
output.sentences: The poorly paved road that led to our hiking trail wasn't great for driving, but it was very scenic.
Considering the bumpy ride, we were very glad that the traffic was almos non-existant.
Once we found the vally and parkng was done the view was defintely worth it.
We went or a hike and then found a spot on a hgh hill to have an afternoon picnic.
Twilight was so pretty we stayed to watch the sun set and were glad that we did.
